basics.name: Lloyd Sanderson
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science and a B.A. in Japanese at the University of Hawaii at Manoa. My expected graduation period is December 2025

work.summary: Work as server for a sushi restaurant.
highlights: Developed skill in customer service as well as interactions between customers and employees
Was able to multitask with various things, and keep time management in check

work.summary: Delivered exemplary customer service, as well as making pizzas and delivering.
highlights: Learned fast-paced restaurant environment, helping and assisting with kitchen staff and in the front counter.
Made pizzas, delivered, took orders, maintained the cleanliness of the store.

volunteer.summary: A annual Halloween event which I would organize set up and carry out
highlights: Teamwork exercises and organization were prevalent and described.
Helping maintain and carry out events and plans according to what was provided.
